title: Agglomerative Clustering on Digits Dataset
description: This lab illustrates various linkage options for agglomerative clustering on a 2D embedding of the digits dataset. The goal of this lab is to show how different linkage strategies behave and not to find good clusters for the digits. This is why the example works on a 2D embedding.

meta.title: Agglomerative Clustering | 2D Embedding | Digits Dataset
meta.description: Explore different linkage strategies for agglomerative clustering on a 2D embedding of the digits dataset. Learn how to use Jupyter Notebook and get tips for a smooth learning experience.
meta.keywords: agglomerative clustering, 2D embedding, digits dataset, Jupyter Notebook, machine learning, data visualization

i18n.title: 数字数据集上的凝聚聚类
i18n.description: 本实验展示了在数字数据集的二维嵌入上进行凝聚聚类的各种链接选项。本实验的目的是展示不同链接策略的表现，而非为数字找到良好的聚类。这就是为什么示例在二维嵌入上运行。

meta.title: 凝聚聚类 | 二维嵌入 | 数字数据集
meta.description: 探索数字数据集二维嵌入上凝聚聚类的不同链接策略。学习如何使用Jupyter Notebook并获取顺畅学习体验的提示。
meta.keywords: 凝聚聚类, 二维嵌入, 数字数据集, Jupyter Notebook, 机器学习, 数据可视化

steps.title: 使用不同链接策略的凝聚聚类
